pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BlinkPDF is yet another webpage-to-pdf converterIt uses PyQt6 and QtWebEngine (with Blink engine) to do so.Pass an URL and an output filename, the page will be retrieved and convertedto PDF. Additionally, it can be given custom cookies and headers and alsosome javascript code to execute (if needing to perform custom tweaks tothe page).## Usage`blinkpdf [--cookie NAME=VALUE] [--header NAME=VALUE] [--run-script JS_SNIPPET] https://pypi.org/project/blinkpdf/ output.pdf`## Install[`pip install blinkpdf`](https://pypi.org/project/blinkpdf/)
